flavor_text: The harder your strike, the stronger her defense.

name: Sheltering Prayers
oracle_text: Basic lands each player controls have shroud as long as that player controls three or fewer lands. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: "It matters not if the gods hear my prayers. Jamuraa does."

name: Samite Sanctuary
oracle_text: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: Our war is against suffering, not against those who cause it. —Samite creed

name: Rhystic Shield
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
flavor_text: A shield for one is good. A shield for everyone is even better.

name: Rhystic Circle
oracle_text: {1}: Any player may pay {1}. If no one does, the next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor_text: The circle buys time—an important commodity in battle.

name: Reveille Squad
oracle_text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, if Reveille Squad is untapped, you may untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text: "To arms! To arms! The Lion roars!"

name: Mirror Strike
oracle_text: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target unblocked creature is dealt to its controller instead.
flavor_text: "Enemies can be your weapons or your shields. Simply show them which they are." —The Teachings of Zho

name: Mine Bearer
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Mine Bearer: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor_text: "The Keldons may have explosive tempers, but I have explosives."

name: Mercenary Informer
oracle_text:
Mercenary Informer can't be the target of black spells or abilities from black sources.
{2}{W}: Put target nontoken Mercenary on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: The problem with rebels is that they so quickly reject authority.

name: Mageta's Boon
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor_text: When the Lion roars, his cubs grow stronger. —Kipamu saying

name: Mageta the Lion
oracle_text: {2}{W}{W}, {T}, Discard two cards: Destroy all creatures except for Mageta the Lion. Those creatures can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: In the jungle of war there is always a Lion.

name: Jeweled Spirit
oracle_text:
Flying
Sacrifice two lands: Jeweled Spirit gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: As he knows all the world completely, the world refuses him harm.

name: Glittering Lynx
oracle_text:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx.
{2}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lynx loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx." Any player may activate this ability.

name: Glittering Lion
oracle_text:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion.
{3}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lion loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion." Any player may activate this ability.

name: Flowering Field
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn."
flavor_text: Some lands are soothing, and their peace can be felt in the soul.

name: Excise
oracle_text: Exile target attacking creature unless its controller pays {X}.
flavor_text: "Creation is no great feat. Anything you make, I can unmake in a heartbeat." —Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Entangler
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can block any number of creatures.
flavor_text: "Tell me again," said Latulla, raising her fist, "how just one woman held back an entire Keldon platoon."

name: Diving Griffin
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: To outrace the griffin —Kipamu expression meaning "to do the impossible"

name: Celestial Convergence
oracle_text:
Celestial Convergence enters the battlefield with seven omen counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from Celestial Convergence. If there are no omen counters on Celestial Convergence, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.

name: Blessed Wind
oracle_text: Target player's life total becomes 20.

name: Aura Fracture
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Jamuraa's rhystic mages treat magic as their garden, uprooting unwanted spells as bothersome weeds.

name: Abolish
oracle_text:
You may discard a Plains card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

oracle_text:
If you have 3 or less life, this spell costs {6} less to cast.
Flying

oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

name: Rhox

You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

{T}: Add {C}.

name: Tangle Wire
oracle_text:
Fading 4 (This artifact enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land they control for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.

oracle_text:
Fading 5 (This creature enters the battlefield with five fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

oracle_text:
Fading 2 (This artifact enters the battlefield with two fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.)

oracle_text:
{2}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{5}, {T}: Destroy target creature with flying.
